channel.title: How to add weapon equipment stats?
channel.description:
If someone knows and willing to teach me how to add the equipment stats, because my models all have 0 stats u know, and then i dont hit high so if some1 knows, u know to find me ;D
I dont know f this is the good section, if its not i was an accident because i dont know under what section this falls, so srry if its wrong

item.title: How to add weapon equipment stats?
item.dc:creator: @rockh4rd rockh4rd
item.description:
@rockh4rd wrote:

This should be in server help but ill help any way

Item.cfg

---------------------Attack Bonuses---------------------------------------------
Stab = A
Slash = B
Crush = C
Magic = D
Range = E
----------------------Defence Bonuses----------------------------------
Stab = F
Slash = G
Crush = H
Magic = I
Range = J
-------------------------Other Bonuses------------------------------------
Stength = K
Prayer = L

------------------------Shop prices/alchs-----------------------------------
Shop sell price = X
Shop buy price = Y
Alch price = Z

item = 1333 Rune_scimitar A_vicious,_curved_sword. X Y Z A B C D E F G H I J K L

Read full topic
